scripts.serve: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/manifest-demo/webpack-host/webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3013 --no-hot
scripts.serve:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/manifest-demo/webpack-host/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 3013
scripts.serve:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/manifest-demo/webpack-host/webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3013 --no-hot
scripts.e2e: pnpm exec cypress run --project apps/manifest-demo/webpack-host --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3013 --browser chrome
scripts.e2e:development: pnpm exec cypress open --project apps/manifest-demo/webpack-host --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:3013 --browser electron
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm exec concurrently "lsof -i :3013 || pnpm --filter 3008-webpack-host run serve:development" "npx wait-on --timeout 240000 tcp:3009 tcp:3010 tcp:3011 tcp:3012 tcp:3013 http-get://localhost:3009/mf-manifest.json http-get://localhost:3010/mf-manifest.json http-get://localhost:3011/mf-manifest.json http-get://localhost:3012/remoteEntry.js http-get://localhost:3013/ && pnpm --filter 3008-webpack-host run e2e"
